DOC.brief_summary: Single center open-label study of an oral agent (RAD001) in subjects with metastatic colorectal cancer refractory to at least 2 standard chemo/biologic regimens.
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Trial of RAD001 in Refractory Colorectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: Metastatic colorectal cancer refractory to at least 2 chemo/biologic regimens Measurable disease ECOG 02 CNS disease Chemotherapy or radiotherapy < 4 weeks prior Active bleeding diathesis
